channel.title: The Morning Tech Show
channel.description: The Morning Tech Show is where Todd and Friends talk tech and in depth discussions on items of interest.
channel.itunes:summary: The Morning Tech Show is a live weekly Tech Show featuring rock stars in the media space. Where we talk tech and do the night show in the morning.
channel.itunes:author: Todd Cochrane
channel.itunes:subtitle: Video Feed of The Morning Tech Show where Todd and friends join discuss the latest Tech Trends
channel.itunes:keywords: Tech Show, Friends, Trends, Science, Space, News, Windows, Apple, OSX, Microsoft

item.title: TMS-2012-05-05 – HD Mobile Broadcast Studio Review
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: I am joined by Rob Greenlee, Podcast Community Manager at Zune/Microsoft and Andy McCaskey from RVNN.tv. We talk about the HDMBS – HD Mobile Broadcast Studio and why it was designed the way it was and what options it brings to the table. I cover the complete build of the unit and interconnects and why [...]
item.content:encoded:
I am joined by Rob Greenlee, Podcast Community Manager at Zune/Microsoft and Andy McCaskey from RVNN.tv. We talk about the HDMBS – HD Mobile Broadcast Studio and why it was designed the way it was and what options it brings to the table. I cover the complete build of the unit and interconnects and why it was built the way it was along with first case use at a local gig.

Subscribe: Audio | Video | Mobile Video | iTunes | Zune

Follow @geeknews on Twitter
Google+ Circle Me!
My Facebook Profile
Podcast Facebook Page
My YouTube Channel
Visit the Ohana Store for GNC Gear!
item.itunes:subtitle: I am joined by Rob Greenlee, Podcast Community Manager at Zune/Microsoft and Andy McCaskey from RVNN.tv. We talk about the HDMBS - HD Mobile Broadcast Studio and why it was designed the way it was and what options it brings to the table.
item.itunes:summary:
I am joined by Rob Greenlee, Podcast Community Manager at Zune/Microsoft and Andy McCaskey from RVNN.tv (http://rvnn.tv). We talk about the HDMBS - HD Mobile Broadcast Studio (http://www.geeknewscentral.com/2012/05/04/hdmbs-high-definition-mobile-broadcast-studio/) and why it was designed the way it was and what options it brings to the table. I cover the complete build of the unit and interconnects and why it was built the way it was along with first case use at a local gig.

item.title: TMS #49 Podcasters & YouTubers Success Questions?
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: This week I am joined by Rob GreenLee of RobGreenlee.com and Chris Pirillo of Lockergnome.com on Saturday Morning Tech Show. We talk tech and try to decipher why there are great YouTubers / Podcasters yet very few of those two groups of content creators have been successful at both. Note this is a monster show [...]
item.content:encoded:
This week I am joined by Rob GreenLee of RobGreenlee.com and Chris Pirillo of Lockergnome.com on Saturday Morning Tech Show. We talk tech and try to decipher why there are great YouTubers / Podcasters yet very few of those two groups of content creators have been successful at both. Note this is a monster show but I think you will find this to be very enlightening.

Subscribe: Audio | Video | Mobile Video | iTunes | Zune

Note this is a monster show but I think you will find this to be very enlightening.

item.title: TMS #46 Foxconn Sweat Shops and more!
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: This week I am joined by Rob GreenLee from Microsoft and Dr. Bill from DrBill.cc. In this episodes we cover the past weeks tech news stories of interest. We do an in depth look at a variety of topics including the sweat shops of Foxconn and the Pay for Review of their operation by Apple. [...]
item.content:encoded:
This week I am joined by Rob GreenLee from Microsoft and Dr. Bill from DrBill.cc. In this episodes we cover the past weeks tech news stories of interest. We do an in depth look at a variety of topics including the sweat shops of Foxconn and the Pay for Review of their operation by Apple.

item.title: TMS #45 National Innovation Alliance
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: Peter Kay from Your Computer Minute and Derek Gabriel join me to talk about the Hawaii Innovation Alliance and during the show Peter launched the National Innovation Alliance. If you have a tech business or are in the tech field you are going to want to watch this episode. I hope that you will consider [...]
item.content:encoded:
Peter Kay from Your Computer Minute and Derek Gabriel join me to talk about the Hawaii Innovation Alliance and during the show Peter launched the National Innovation Alliance. If you have a tech business or are in the tech field you are going to want to watch this episode. I hope that you will consider becoming active in one of the two groups.

Sponsor:
: Get a Free Book and 14 day Free Trial at Audible! Visit AudiblePodcast.com/morningtech

item.itunes:subtitle: Peter Kay from Your Computer Minute and Derek Gabriel join me to talk about the Hawaii Innovation Alliance and during the show Peter launched the National Innovation Alliance. If you have a tech business or are in the tech field you are going to want t...
item.itunes:summary:
Peter Kay from Your Computer Minute and Derek Gabriel join me to talk about the Hawaii Innovation Alliance (http://www.facebook.com/groups/hawaiiinnovationalliance/) and during the show Peter launched the National Innovation Alliance (http://www.facebook.com/groups/317079051672912/). If you have a tech business or are in the tech field you are going to want to watch this episode. I hope that you will consider becoming active in one of the two groups.

item.title: TMS #33 Figuring Out New Media
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: Rob Greenlee and I talk tech and new media and look at where the future lays in the new media space along with a lot of other cool tech topics for the past week. Subscribe: Audio | HD | Mobile Video | iTunes | Zune Download the Mobile Version Video Show File Follow @geeknews on [...]
item.content:encoded:
Rob Greenlee and I talk tech and new media and look at where the future lays in the new media space along with a lot of other cool tech topics for the past week.
